name: ci-project-one
description: A static (front-end only) website for an 80s inspired cinematic synth-pop band from California.
author: Vilius Dzemyda <hello@viliusdzemyda.com>

scripts.build:sass: node-sass -r --output-style expanded scss/main.scss -o css && node-sass -r --output-style compact scss/bootstrap.scss -o css
scripts.watch:sass: npm run build:sass && npm run build:sass -- -w
